metadata.title: CVE-2021-41498 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in ajaxsoundstudio.com Pyo &lt and 1.03 in the Server_jack_init function. which allows attackers to conduct Denial of Service attacks by arbitrary constructing a overlong server name.

criterions.comment: python-pyo package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
